summary: Tested Calendar page appointment creation and walker dropdown visibility logic. All backend API tests pass (13/13). Frontend UI tests confirm walker dropdown is correctly shown only for walk services and hidden for non-walk services.
passed_tests: Get services endpoint returns walk and non-walk services
Get walkers endpoint returns available walkers
Get clients endpoint returns available clients
Create walk_30 appointment with walker assignment
Walk services (walk_30, walk_45, walk_60) correctly identified for walker dropdown
Non-walk services correctly identified to hide walker dropdown
UI: Walker dropdown visible when walk service selected
UI: Walker dropdown hidden when transport service selected
critical_code_review_comments: The isWalkService() function in CalendarPage.js correctly checks if service type contains 'walk' to determine walker dropdown visibility
Backend admin_create_appointment endpoint correctly handles appointments with or without walker_id
Walker availability validation works correctly - prevents double-booking with 15-min buffer
seed_data_creation: Test appointments created for walk_30, walk_45, doggy_day_care, transport, concierge, petsit_our_location services
context_for_next_testing_agent: Calendar page appointment creation tested. Walker dropdown visibility logic confirmed working: shows for walk_30/walk_45/walk_60, hidden for day_care/transport/concierge/overnight services. Admin credentials: demo_admin/demo123. Calendar page URL: /admin/calendar
